5.9.7.name: wordpress/better-page-speed
5.9.7.description:
This is the newest, freshest & best wordpress plugin for you in case you want to add a Facebook Like Button to your website / blog! Add a Facebook Like Button to your wordpress blog with a lot of customization options, And you can preview the settings at real-time in the settings section - with our Facebook Like Button Widget. Add the Facebook Like Button count, or normal by using short cuts [fb_like] [fb_count].

Add Facebook Recommendations Widget to your blog sidebar or to anywhere using this shortcut [fb_rec] within our Plugin.

Mulitple language support for our Facebook Like Button Plugin, you can change the button language to your language in 3.4!

Dear users, our plugins are available for free download. If you have any questions or recommendations regarding the functionality of our plugins (existing options, new options, current issues), please feel free to contact us. Please note that we accept requests in English only. All messages in another langua
